alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 2:55PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Kane County through 330 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles south of Henrieville, or 26 miles northeast of Kanab, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Kane County. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 23 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
